hibernate-mapping.query: select new ProductCodeDto ( a.Id, a.ProductCode, a.Description, a.RelatedGLACode ) from LOMORM00415 as a where (a.ProductCode = :productCode or a.Description = :description or a.RelatedGLACode = :gLCode) and a.Active = true

select new ProductCodeDto( a.Id, a.ProductCode, a.Description, a.RelatedGLACode, a.Active, a.TS, a.CreatedDate, a.CreatedUserId, a.UpdatedDate, a.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00415 as a where (a.ProductCode = :productCode or a.Description = :description or a.RelatedGLACode = :gLCode)

select new ProductCodeDto( a.Id, a.ProductCode, a.Description, a.RelatedGLACode, a.Active, a.TS, a.CreatedDate, a.CreatedUserId, a.UpdatedDate, a.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00415 as a where a.Active = true
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select distinct ACode,ACName from COA Where Active=1 and ACode != subString(ACode,1,3)+'000' order by ACode

Insert into PersonalLoan_Product_Setup (Id,ProductCode ,Description,RelatedGLACode, Active, CreatedDate,CreatedUserId ) select isnull((select MAX(Id) from PersonalLoan_Product_Setup),0)+1,:ProductCode,:Description ,:RelatedGLACode, :Active,:CreatedDate,:CreatedUserId

update PersonalLoan_Product_Setup set
Description = :Description, RelatedGLACode = :RelatedGLACode, UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where Id = :Id and Active = :Active
